name: Fromagic
description:
Play as the little frog and jump around the swamp to get to the magic lilies and find your way home!

A & D - move left and right

Space - jump (double tap for a super jump!)

Left click - eat flies

Made by:

- Leonard Neitzel

- Artëm Gulyaev

- Junjie Zhang

- Catriona Barclay
